title: Mrbuck
author: Mrbuck
content: I compare btc with cucci or chanel or rolex, limited stock and high price. Everybody want them to look good and to show others,btc scheme sounds same like rolex the limited supply and high price i compare btc with high fashion designe brands or some special cars like bucati or rolex or some expensive LV hand bags. The same marketing method been used the point is to sell btc with highest price as possible If you buy the btc you can look cool and fancy  So ye btc is fashion like brand

comments.author: Maslate
comments.body: Quote from: Mrbuck on January 01, 2025, 08:31:37 AMI compare btc with cucci or chanel or rolex, limited stock and high price. Everybody want them to look good and to show others,btc scheme sounds same like rolex the limited supply and high price i compare btc with high fashion designe brands or some special cars like bucati or rolex or some expensive LV hand bags. The same marketing method been used the point is to sell btc with highest price as possible If you buy the btc you can look cool and fancy  So ye btc is fashion like brand Those brands lack utility and don’t have a network for transactions. Rolex might hold value, but it doesn’t have the same potential as Bitcoin. The demand for Rolex is pretty limited, catering mostly to the wealthy, while Bitcoin goes beyond that. It promotes decentralized transactions and offers an opportunity for anyone, even the poor to grow their wealth if they invest wisely. Rolex could never do that.Bitcoin has this kind of utility. medium of exchangestore of value remittance across boarderprivacyhow about rolex?

comments.author: Rockstarguy
comments.body: Quote from: Mrbuck on January 01, 2025, 08:31:37 AMI compare btc with cucci or chanel or rolex, limited stock and high price. Everybody want them to look good and to show others,btc scheme sounds same like rolex the limited supply and high price i compare btc with high fashion designe brands or some special cars like bucati or rolex or some expensive LV hand bags. The same marketing method been used the point is to sell btc with highest price as possible If you buy the btc you can look cool and fancy  So ye btc is fashion like brand What you think about bitcoin is not what bitcoin, all the things you just compared with bitcoin are not even close to bitcoin,  with time the value of all you mentioned will drop but whatever amount of Bitcoin you have and hodl, you will definitely yield very good value from it. It ie not everyone who cares much about luxuries, some people prefer to invest instead of spending money on luxuries. But I'm very sure everyone's care about bitcoin, even those who don't have bitcoin wish to have it.When you think of bitcoin you should be thinking about value. Luxuries don't give value in the future instead they lose value as time counts .

comments.author: icalical
comments.body: I understand the comparisons of Bitcoin to Gucci or Rolex because of the limited supply and high prices, but for me Bitcoin is more than a status symbol. Sure, it is scarcity that drives demand, but Bitcoin also functions both as a decentralized currency and an investment. While fashion brand barely have any unique functionality and utility, bitcoin has it's own features that other currency and investment does not have, it's decentralization. Thus, although Bitcoin shares some characteristics with luxury brands, its role as a digital asset and economic tool entails more than being a "fashion brand".

comments.author: olivia36mcdowell
comments.created_time: January 01, 2025, 11:25:49 AMLast edit: January 02, 2025, 05:10:47 AM by olivia36mcdowell
comments.body: Quote from: Mrbuck on January 01, 2025, 08:31:37 AMI compare btc with cucci or chanel or rolex, limited stock and high price. Everybody want them to look good and to show others,btc scheme sounds same like rolex the limited supply and high price i compare btc with high fashion designe brands or some special cars like bucati or rolex or some expensive LV hand bags bogo subwayThe same marketing method been used the point is to sell btc with highest price as possible If you buy the btc you can look cool and fancy  So ye btc is fashion like brand Your comparison of Bitcoin (BTC) to high-end fashion brands like Gucci, Chanel, Rolex, and luxury cars like Bugatti is interesting! Both BTC and these luxury items share some common characteristics:Limited Supply: Like luxury brands, Bitcoin has a capped supply—only 21 million BTC will ever exist, making it scarce.High Price: Both BTC and luxury brands command high prices due to their limited supply and perceived value.Status Symbol: Owning BTC or luxury items can be seen as a status symbol, reflecting wealth and sophistication.Marketing Strategy: Both utilize a marketing strategy that emphasizes exclusivity and desirability.BTC, like a high-fashion brand, can be seen as something people buy not just for its utility but also for the prestige it brings.

comments.author: Darker45
comments.body: Although I agree that Bitcoin is like limited edition Guccis and Chanels and Rolexes because of its limited supply, I don't agree that Bitcoin is "fashion like brand". Expensive fashion is mainly for showing off, it's for public display more or less. On the contrary, at least as far as my experience is concerned, Bitcoin is the opposite. I'm hiding it as much as possible. I won't even open to other people that I have Bitcoin. My involvement with Bitcoin is the exact opposite of luxurious fashion; I'm keeping it to myself, hiding it from public.

comments.author: BlackBoss_
comments.body: Quote from: Mrbuck on January 01, 2025, 08:31:37 AMI compare btc with cucci or chanel or rolex, limited stock and high price.You are comparing an asset (bitcoin) to many liabilities (Gucci, Channel, Rolex, stocks, and others). This comparision is very terrible.QuoteEverybody want them to look good and to show others,btc scheme sounds same like rolex the limited supply and high price i compare btc with high fashion designe brands or some special cars like bucati or rolex or some expensive LV hand bags. The same marketing method been used the point is to sell btc with highest price as possible If you buy the btc you can look cool and fancy  So ye btc is fashion like brand Bitcoin is not a fashion, and it's different than altcoins that are created by trends which you can call as fashions.Bitcoin is created with solid reasons to build up a blockchain that is decentralized, no censorship, and a digital currency that is not inflationary too much with time. Until 2140, Bitcoin is inflationary but its inflationary is coded to be halved every four years and you will not have anything like this in the world. Together with some unique specifications like decentralization and non-censorship, Bitcoin is unique, not only in blockchain and cryptocurrency area.

comments.author: NeuroticFish
comments.body: Quote from: Mrbuck on January 01, 2025, 08:31:37 AMSo ye btc is fashion like brand Imho this is a very narrow view over bitcoin.Yes, it can be seen as an investment.Yes, it can be seen as a trend.Yes, it can make people sound cool.But don't do the mistake to see only this facet of bitcoin. Bitcoin is better than all of those and offers much more:* you can get it with you anywhere effortlessly and it holds great value* you can hold it without anybody knowing it about it, without anybody having any chance to get it away from you (you may need to be a bit careful for that though)* bitcoin contains smarter technology than a Rolex imho* Bitcoin cannot be counterfeit - unlike a Rolex, fashion and so on (of course, you have to pay a little attention what blockchain you use, since forks or wrapped coins do exist)* Bitcoin is imho much more future proof than any of your examples

comments.author: Justtoons
comments.body: Quote from: Mrbuck on January 01, 2025, 08:31:37 AMI compare btc with cucci or chanel or rolex, limited stock and high price. Everybody want them to look good and to show others,btc scheme sounds same like rolex the limited supply and high price i compare btc with high fashion designe brands or some special cars like bucati or rolex or some expensive LV hand bags. The same marketing method been used the point is to sell btc with highest price as possible If you buy the btc you can look cool and fancy So ye btc is fashion like brand Absolutely, that's an interesting comparison! Bitcoin really does carry that luxury vibe, much like high end brands. Just like a limited edition Rolex or a designer handbag, Bitcoin's scarcity and prestige make it appealing to many. It's not just about the investment; it’s also about status and identity. Owning Bitcoin can feel like being part of an exclusive club, and that allure is definitely part of its charm. Plus, the way it’s marketed and perceived in the culture adds to that "luxury brand" image. What do you think drives that desire for people to associate with it

comments.author: NotATether
comments.body: Quote from: Darker45 on January 01, 2025, 11:26:15 AMOn the contrary, at least as far as my experience is concerned, Bitcoin is the opposite. I'm hiding it as much as possible. I won't even open to other people that I have Bitcoin. My involvement with Bitcoin is the exact opposite of luxurious fashion; I'm keeping it to myself, hiding it from public. That puts you in a minority unfortunately, because most people who "invest" bitcoins (or sometimes steal it) buy expensive cars, expensive houses, livestream their stacks of cash on social media, and then they get robbed.

comments.author: MarjorieZimmermanGinger
comments.body: Quote from: Mrbuck on January 01, 2025, 08:31:37 AMI compare btc with cucci or chanel or rolex, limited stock and high price. Everybody want them to look good and to show others,btc scheme sounds same like rolex the limited supply and high price i compare btc with high fashion designe brands or some special cars like bucati or rolex or some expensive LV hand bags. The same marketing method been used the point is to sell btc with highest price as possible If you buy the btc you can look cool and fancy  So ye btc is fashion like brand The difference is bitcoin can be owned by anyone in different amounts while others are limited as you said not everyone can afford it, that's why bitcoin is unique and even though it is quite expensive people can buy it in installments in smaller amounts while the items you mentioned can't be bought by ordinary people like us. Although one of the factors is the limited amount available which makes bitcoin look more expensive, there are other issues that also affect it.The comparison may be similar but it has no similarity to the journey of bitcoin and I consider it something a little different. But in any case, Bitcoin is much more reliable for hedging purposes, even though the products you mentioned also have similarities that are not much different in terms of scarcity and price.

comments.author: Zaguru12
comments.body: Quote from: Usdcboss on January 01, 2025, 12:40:03 PMBtc fees way too High to use it for everyday payments btc is store value more or digital gold or reserve asset.Btc is not money If you Speaking about unbanked- then stablecoins suit well fast and many blockchains very cheap transactions. Think about If you do everyday btc transactions for shopping you end up losing huge money by the end of the year that's the problem.Btc now is for the rich people poor people unbanked can't afford to pay that fees....rather we use xrp or sol I don't understood If you just trolling here or you not using btc but you should understood btc not money its a asset wall street told everybody what is the btc it's not money it's digital gold the blackrock told this and btc is blackrock thing they know best what is the btc and what's not not some random guy here on btalk i listen blackrock they know best There is no doubt about that bitcoin scalability is still a huge issue but using bitcoin daily most of the time more cost effective most especially if it is cross boarder transactions. Bitcoin fees skyrocket only when the network is congested, Just like commercial banks also experiencing network hitches sometimes. Bitcoin can be treated as money because it can be used as currency for payment and it is not meant for the rich because it whole is expensive but rather you can simply have it in units even uptill cents valuations. So even the poor can own units of bitcoin. People compare the scalability of bitcoin to XRP and sol because they are fast in transactions but my argument has always been do they have the large volume of transactions that the bitcoin network has?

comments.author: Frankolala
comments.body: Quote from: Mrbuck on January 01, 2025, 08:31:37 AMI compare btc with cucci or chanel or rolex, limited stock and high price. Everybody want them to look good and to show others,btc scheme sounds same like rolex the limited supply and high price i compare btc with high fashion designe brands or some special cars like bucati or rolex or some expensive LV hand bags. The same marketing method been used the point is to sell btc with highest price as possible If you buy the btc you can look cool and fancy  So ye btc is fashion like brand This is where you get it all wrong because bitcoin is a decentralized currency that you can use to buy goods and services accross boarder without an intermediary. Bitcoin is available for all to buy because the price can be affordable by the poor and you can buy in unit. All those things that you are thinking is on the same package with bitcoin is only for the rich and only the rich can afford them. If you buy a Bugatti currently, in four years time the value has depreciated but bitcoin value increases inside your wallet. Will you buy a Bugatti and say that you have invested.... Nah.
